title: Perfect
comment: It simply does what should do. The original website has been closed some days ago. Thanks for taking care of the future of this app!

title: You will need to tap 5 times
comment: just to get started writing. Bad design.
Hi leo! Once the app is open you just need to tap on the plus sign and select "new note" to start writing. Can you clarify your workflow for me, so that i can improve the design of the app?

title: A poor ripoff...?
comment: I have the real Writeily Pro installed, checked into this one out of curiosity because so many shady fetchers pirate good apps on the Play Store, and then you see a thousand apps of crap in the blink of an eye. Not clear on the blatancy of this nugget, but I can say it's definitely the inferior of the two, and strangely the real Writeily Pro is M.I.A. from the Play Store. Proceed with caution!

Hallo Keirus, sorry to hear that you feel like the quality of the app has degraded.
First off: this is not a rip off. The project was kindly transfered to me from the original author. You can read his statement here http://tinyurl.com/ntnckf4 - The quality of the codebase has barely changed (if not improved) since the transfer.
http://writeily.me/

title: Please!?
comment: Please embed Roboto Slab! It's open source anyway! Also sometimes cursor jumps randomly to other lines.

title: Not too bad
comment: Needs some more features to become a really good app (such as look nice on tablet screen size, smoother view/edit transitions), but otherwise good app.
Thank you for the feedback! I'm working on smoother transitions right now...

title: Even better than before
comment: Excited to see where this goes!
